text: Motion
Motion

Everyone, Thank you for coming to watch
Amana and the others' stage.
Motion

Today, if it's alright,
May I speak a little seriously?

...We,
are here thanks to everyone's kindness.

Kindness, it can be empowering...
That's what I've been thinking about conveying.

But, there are days when we just can't be kind,
Or when kindness feels tough, right?

When we're tired...
Or feeling down... I think we all have those days...

Tenka and the others too...
Feel the same...
But...
It's to those "you" that we want to reach out to.

Everyone who's come here,
Of course, our fans, but...

Not just you, but also many others out there,
Someday, our songs... our feelings...
May they reach you.
Motion

Tenka and the others...
We'll keep working even harder from now on...!

Even more, to reach many more people...
With Tenka and the others' songs...

To convey Tenka and the others' feelings...
We'll do our best!
Motion

Thank you. Surely, we're encouraged
by everyone more than you think.

So, ALSTROEMERIA,
We'll sing to encourage everyone.

Things that can't be conveyed just through words,
We'll convey them through our songs, through music...

May our feelings
Reach you.

Please listen,
[Ashita mo Beautiful Day]──
